mapper.select: SELECT * FROM LOAN_EXECUTIONS ORDER BY ID
SELECT * FROM LOAN_EXECUTIONS WHERE LOAN_ID = #{loanId} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
SELECT * FROM LOAN_EXECUTIONS WHERE STATUS = #{status} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOAN_EXECUTIONS (LOAN_ID, EXECUTION_DATE, AMOUNT, FROM_ACCOUNT, TO_ACCOUNT, TRANSACTION_ID, STATUS, ERROR_MESSAGE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{loanId}, #{executionDate}, #{amount}, #{fromAccount}, #{toAccount}, #{transactionId}, #{status}, #{errorMessage}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE LOAN_EXECUTIONS SET LOAN_ID = #{loanId}, EXECUTION_DATE = #{executionDate}, AMOUNT = #{amount}, FROM_ACCOUNT = #{fromAccount}, TO_ACCOUNT = #{toAccount}, TRANSACTION_ID = #{transactionId}, STATUS = #{status}, ERROR_MESSAGE = #{errorMessage}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt} WHERE ID = #{id}
